title: 14 day suspension
body: 14 day suspension because of a few jokes and my team attacked me ?  Give me a break Riot. I have been here since you created this game day one. I will no longer support this. Take care !

replies.body:
I was toxic 1 game and got it too :) Now im afraid to play anymore cuz next ban is "perma ban" :)  If that happens, goodbye $300 :))))))))))))))))))))))))

I was thinking tho, if riot do that thing what CSGO is doing which is the "overwatch" system where players watch the suspect and see whether or not they're cheating, and if you do a lot you get a reward.
So something like that, allowing other players judge instead of bots or rioters banning you and getting a reward if you get some successful bans and help out a lot.
Just an idea tho :)
If you share your chat logs, I could weigh in on why you were suspended.

Rioters don't ban, they don't even look at your records unless you make a case, that's the only time you get a manual review. Even then they'll find the dumbest shit to give you a reason they feel it's justified.

Don't worry, i had someone attacked me today and i got a 14-day suspension out of it because i tried to defend myself. The fucked up thing is, i know i did the mistake of stooping down to their level BUT the punishment was one sided. They only penalised me and they didn't do anything against the other player who was harassing me all game.
Hmmmmmmmmmm chat log? Lying about your chat doesn't help.
